      • DrawableTarget

        public DrawableTarget(int newX,
                      int newY,
                      int newDiam,
                      java.awt.Color newColor,
                      java.awt.Color newAltColor)
        Construct a new drawable target
        Parameters:
        newX - starting x value
        newY - starting y value
        newDiam - starting diameter
        newColor - base color of the target
        newAltColor - color of the alternating rings

      • drawConcentric

        public void drawConcentric(java.awt.Graphics g,
                           int x,
                           int y,
                           int diam,
                           java.awt.Color col)
        Draws a series of smaller rings Adds subsequent rings if there is still space for them Target is always a perfect circle
        Parameters:
        g - the Graphics object to draw the target on
        x - leftmost point of the ring
        y - uppermost point of the ring
        diam - the diameter of the current ring
        alt - if true, use the alternate color instead of the fill color for this ring
